    #######TASK 
    Provide a factually correct and detailed textual description of the game compiled from the information presented above from different sources, in more than 1000 words.
            "Cap:": represents the captions published in the online portal usually within 30 seconds of the event.
            "E:" represents events recorded exactly after the event happened.
    Don't mention sources of information like commentators or captions, write as if you saw them live.
summary:
In a hard-fought encounter at the San Siro, AC Milan managed to secure a 2-1 victory over Crotone. The match, teeming with excitement and drama, kept fans on the edge of their seats from the kick-off to the final whistle.

The game began with Crotone taking the kick-off. Right from the start, Crotone looked eager to make an impact. Within the first half-minute, they managed to take a shot on target, signaling their intent to go on the offensive. However, the ball soon went out of play, necessitating a throw-in for AC Milan. This early action set the tone for what would be a relentless encounter.

Both teams exchanged possession and chances throughout the initial stages of the match. AC Milan committed their first foul at the 2:05 mark, leading to an indirect free-kick for Crotone. Though the resulting play did not pose a significant threat, it underscored the physical nature of the contest. AC Milan's defense had to clear the ball at regular intervals, reflecting the pressure applied by Crotone.

AC Milan responded with some attacking flair of their own. They managed to capitalize on a corner at the 5-minute mark and attempted a shot off target shortly thereafter. This back-and-forth battle saw both teams squander opportunities. Another shot by AC Milan at the 6:13 mark went wide, much to the relief of the visiting side.

As the minutes ticked by, the game continued to ebb and flow. Crotone had their share of attempts, with a shot off target at 7:11 and another corner shortly afterward. Despite their efforts, the finishing touch was missing.

A significant moment came at the 11:09 mark when Crotone once again put the AC Milan defense to the test with a shot on target. The resultant play saw the ball go out of play, giving Milan a momentary respite. Moments later, a foul by Crotone offered AC Milan a chance to regroup. 

However, the persistent Crotone attack paid off at the 25:43 mark. Following a successful shot on target, Crotone stunned the San Siro crowd with a well-deserved goal, taking a 1-0 lead. AC Milan found themselves trailing, which acted as a catalyst for their resurgence. 

Post the kick-off, AC Milan immediately mounted an offensive push. Their efforts were rewarded when they secured a corner at the 34:11 mark, before Gabriel managed to right the ship with a well-placed shot on target that found the net at the 40:13 mark, bringing the score level to 1-1. The relief and jubilation were palpable among the Milan supporters. 

The equalizer seemed to breathe new life into AC Milan. In the ensuing minutes, they continued to press, creating chances and keeping the Crotone defense on their toes. Crotone's fouls and a yellow card toward the end of the first half reflected their attempts to stifle Milan's momentum.

The second half began similarly intense. AC Milan commenced the half with a kick-off, only to commit a foul just six seconds in. This resulted in frequent exchanges of indirect free kicks and fouls by both teams. The physicality of the match remained unabated, with Crotone accumulating yellow cards for their aggressive play.

At the 7:40 mark, AC Milan saw a golden opportunity with a penalty due to a foul by a Crotone player. However, their attempt was flagged offside, letting Crotone off the hook momentarily. Both teams continued to battle, with Crotone even attempting to catch their opponents offside multiple times.

The introduction of substitutions around the 25-minute mark sought to inject fresh energy into both sides. Crotone made their first change at 25:12 followed by a couple more strategic substitutions against the hosts. AC Milan's decision to bring in fresh legs at the 27:51 mark also indicated their intent to push for a winner.

As the game moved into its final stages, AC Milan pressed harder, evident through frequent throw-ins and corners. The Crotone defense was resolute, as was their counter-attacking intent. The deadlock was finally broken at the 40:43 mark. In a thrilling turn of events, AC Milan found the back of the net again, making it 2-1. It was the result of persistent attacking and strategic play, much to the delight of the home crowd.

The concluding moments of the match saw Crotone making desperate attempts to get back into the game. However, AC Milan remained steadfast, not allowing any lapses in concentration. It was a testament to their defensive resolve that they thwarted Crotone's attempts to level the score.

The referees were kept busy throughout the match, with multiple fouls necessitating indirect and direct free-kicks. Yellow cards were handed out to maintain discipline, further contributing to the intensity of the game.

In conclusion, the match at the San Siro was a fiery encounter characterized by its competitiveness, physicality, and tactical prowess. Both teams had their moments, but ultimately, AC Milan's clinical edge and resilience shone through in securing a 2-1 victory over a determined Crotone side. Their victory not only added crucial points to their tally but also underlined their capacity to overcome challenges and deliver when it most mattered.
